at my computer which means i have several charging connections and devices tangled on my workstation.my husband bought a few of these hooks, applied one of them to the side of the computer, and hung all the connectors and devices on the hooks.no more tangles!more space on my workstation!less stress since i'm more organized now!thank you hubby, and thank you 3m for a great product!
damage-free organization- say goodbye to holes, marks, or sticky residue on your walls, doors, cabinets, or closets; command hooks by 3m are easy to use and help keep your walls looking beautiful
command hooks let you hang what you want, where you want, without the hassle of tools and nails
i use them to hang potholders in my kitchen, poufs in my bathroom and lanyards in my preschool classroom
